comment: he is a pretty good teacher, you just have to show up and do everything becuse a missed assignment will hurt you a lot, but that's like every class. most important is do your work, come to class,show you are doing your best and oh yeah try and learn something because that matters. improvement matters in this class a lot.

One of my favorites this semester. We did what you would expect in English class, with reading and writing, but it was also so unlike what we did in high school and I really feel like I improved because of this class and havng a good teacher.
you will read and write a lot in this class. it's a required class so almost everybody has to take it, but i am glad i took Mr. Gardner's class. he is a cool teacher over all. very nice sweet guy =o)

I liked him a lot, he knows his stuff and wants his students to know it too. I love English and writing so of course I thought I would like my English class, but he made it way better than I expected. There is a fair amount of work, but that didn't bother me. Attend all the lectures, do all the work, show you care, improve, and you'll do great :o)

Professor Gardner is a very nice guy who also cares about his students. Explains the grading if you ask, and doesn't give too many papers overall. Attendance is required so you should come to classes. Do that, do the work, meet with him if you need to, and all will be fine.
Recommended. Nice guy, super into making us learn. I learned alot in his class.

He was extremely helpful throughout the semester. He's really serious about coming to classes,& does take points from your grade after missing three classes.He's extremely kind and willing to work with his students after class.If you took AP courses,or any honor courses in English, his class is very simple.If not, seek help from the writing center

I thought he class was super easy and really easy going, but at the end of the semester i found my grade was a D and i barely ended the class with a C. There were 5 papers i believe which I averaged at least a B- throught all of them, so i was kind of surprised that I ended with a C.

Great professor!  He is really helpful and obviously loves the subject.  There are quite a few discussions throughout the class.  If you proofread your papers, you can get an A or B easily.  Overall, he is a really good professor.

LOVED him ! He is a great professor! He starts everybody's essay at a "C" and your grade can either go up or down If you make lower than a "C" you have an opportunity to revise for a grade of a "C." He is funny and has a good personality. There are no tests/quizzes and the assignments are easy.
Good guy just very technology based loves to use multiple web sites and he takes no excuses really enjoyed the class and if you stay on top of your work it's very easy to get an a

His class is not hard at all. He teaches you what he wants in his papers during his class, and very easy to talk to you. If he sees everybody having a problem with certain grammatical errors he will talk about the problem and help everybody during class. As long as you listen in class and pay attention, it will be easy to pass.
